main event: On 7 September 1967, two residents of Ithaca, New York observed an unidentified flying object that was described as a bright, elongated, metallic-appearing object hovering in the sky before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving slowly from east to west at approximately 10 to 15 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes., The objects faded from view, suggesting an unusual method of disappearance., Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings on the same date, confirming the phenomenon., The police department received several other reports from citizens regarding an unidentified object the same night.
sighted object: two elongated, metallic-appearing objects in the sky
witness description: Residents from Ithaca, including police officers and local civilians.
